items.name: apdu-too-long
items.description: APDU is too long to process.

items.name: application-exceeded-reply-time
items.description: Application exceeded the allowed reply time.

items.name: insufficient-security
items.description: Insufficient security level for the requested operation.

items.name: invalid-apdu-in-this-state
items.description: Invalid APDU received in the current state.

items.name: other
items.description: Other reason not covered by the enumerated values.

items.name: out-of-resources
items.description: Out of resources to complete the operation.

items.name: preempted-by-higher-priority-task
items.description: Operation was preempted by a higher priority task.

items.name: segmentation-not-supported
items.description: Segmentation is not supported by the device.

items.name: window-size-out-of-range
items.description: Window size is out of the acceptable range.
